title: Constance Langdon IS a Witch!
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: Maybe the ghosts don't kill Constance because they really don't want to be stuck with her for the rest of their lives LOL

I like the idea of Fiona being her twin. It would also explain more as to why Fiona was so upset and envious of Madison. Not only does Madison remind Fiona of her lost youth and beauty but also the fact she’s a famous celebrity reminds her of Constance and her lost dreams as well.

God, I really hope that Jessica is coming back. AHS hasn't been the same without her and since it's a crossover of 2 seasons with Jessica it would only make sense for her to return. ♥️ Love the theory videos
Addie had the same power.  She KNEW that people’s (twins, Vivian) fate.  “You’re going to die here.”
The only reason why Constance recommends building a gazebo is because she wants Moira stuck there forever
